* 1 can be picked from the [Swamp](/swamp/) staging area.
* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): 1 can be picked from an outcropping to the left of the entrance to [The Hanging Sepulchers](/theHangingSepulchers/).
* Can be looted from dead [Bog lurker](/bogLurkerDeadfire/).
